lyrics.translation: I'm afraid to never go again

lyrics.original: kheft ma nzidch nroh w troh sorto men bali
lyrics.translation: I'm afraid to never go again and that his pictures goes away from my mind
I wish for him

lyrics.original: Khatri yetmenah w iji yejles qoubali
lyrics.translation: I wish for him to come and sit in front of me.
